product_name: Zoot Z Force 1.0 Wetzoot Wetsuit - Women's
long_description: Need a secret weapon on race day? The full-sleeve Zoot Z Force 1.0 WetZoot Wetsuit for women features a winning combination of flexibility and buoyancy that lets you slice through the water with ease. Lightweight, neoprene fabric offers stretchy flexibility, buoyancy and added warmth in the water. State-of-the-art seams (glued, blind-stitched and reinforced) are strong, flexible, waterproof and smooth against skin. Back zipper is specially designed to stretch with your body, so as not to restrict movement. Ergonomically shaped, women-specific panels match the contours of your body, reducing drag in the water. Aqualift technology in the women's Zoot Z Force 1.0 WetZoot Wetsuit boosts your buoyancy, raising your legs and torso for increased power.
short_description: Need a secret weapon on race day? The full-sleeve Zoot Z Force 1.0 WetZoot Wetsuit for women features a winning combination of flexibility and buoyancy that lets you slice through the water with ease.
